sentences.sContent: The American Bobtail is a medium-to-large, naturally occurring, bobtailed cat; a noticeably athletic animal, well muscled, with the appearance of power.
sentences.sContent_eng: The American Bobtail is a medium-to-large, naturally occurring, bobtailed cat; a noticeably athletic animal, well muscled, with the appearance of power.
sentences.sCn: 美国短尾猫是一种大中体形，自然形成的短尾猫；一种引人注目的好动的动物，肌肉发达，有强有力的外形。

synos.tran: 短尾；截尾的动物；截短的尾巴

trans.tranCn: 短尾, 截短的尾巴, 截尾的动物
